analysis.description:
Reentrancy in ICO.fallback (/unique_chucks/30/0x85f8c84b0f7a212b23b5586889ec3152aff5cc99.sol#323-334):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(msg.sender,msg.value.mul(rate)) (/unique_chucks/30/0x85f8c84b0f7a212b23b5586889ec3152aff5cc99.sol#328-331)
	External calls sending eth:
	- funds_address.transfer(msg.value) (/unique_chucks/30/0x85f8c84b0f7a212b23b5586889ec3152aff5cc99.sol#331)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- collected (/unique_chucks/30/0x85f8c84b0f7a212b23b5586889ec3152aff5cc99.sol#334)

ICO.fallback (/unique_chucks/30/0x85f8c84b0f7a212b23b5586889ec3152aff5cc99.sol#323-334) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,msg.value.mul(rate)) (/unique_chucks/30/0x85f8c84b0f7a212b23b5586889ec3152aff5cc99.sol#328-331)
